alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Inland; Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 3:01PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Baldwin, southwestern Escambia and north central Escambia Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 300 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Poarch Creek Reservation, or 13 miles northwest of Atmore, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Atmore, McCullough, I65 And CR 1, I65 And AL 21, Bratt and Poarch Creek Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for south central and southwestern Alabama...and northwestern Florida.
